body: Not the most certain what that was all about but ages ago I had a few fantasy's like this and this satisfied those finally

yeah... Just I get some of the stuff even the wtf ones but this one is just plain bizarre that I even question on who seriously wants to be tiny just to well.... Yeah I'm just lost for words at this point
What is it with giant women and tiny men? Dose the person who wrote this have a insecurity we don't know about, or something?
